original_text:
A sluggard buries his hand in the dish;
    he is too lazy to bring it back to his mouth.
korean_text: 게으른 자는 그 손을 그릇에 넣고도 입으로 올리기를 괴로워하느니라

sentences.original_text: A sluggard buries his hand in the dish
sentences.korean_translation: 게으른 자가 자기 손을 그릇에 넣고

sentences.original_text: he is too lazy to bring it back to his mouth
